example.text: If Republicans' Default on America Act passes, families will be hurt. The funding that we passed to curb gun violence, for violence disruption and mental health, and to fight gun trafficking? Gutted. The funding we passed to get toxic-exposed veterans health care? Slashed. [[url]]

This Mental Health Awareness Month, I'm proud of the historic investments we made in mental health services with the Bipartisan Safer Communities Act, including: ? School mental health services ? Community health clinics ? ??? Mental health training for providers/first responders

Shoring up cybersecurity Amidst a rise in cyberattacks from foreign adversaries, Kirsten is introducing bipartisan legislation to help the US work with allies and partners to guard against cyber threats from Iran and other hostile cyber actors. The Abraham Accords Cybersecurity Cooperation Act would authorize cybersecurity cooperation between the US and the Abraham Accords countries - Israel, Morocco, the United Arab Emirates, and Bahrain - to enhance security in the region and protect our critical infrastructure.
